attributes.action: Discontinue the interference of religious groups in forming/amending/changing law in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Religious groups are increasingly making demands on the Government, forcing their particular views on various subjects, trying to directly/indirectly influence policy making/changing. The government of the UK is democratic, the nation is multicultural, it’s people posses a plethora of varying views on religion and therefore the Government has a responsibility to make important decisions based on fact, not faith. It is not right for religious groups to impress their view on laws that affect a nation whose overwhelming majority is without a faith.
